name: Garmin Vivomove Style
description: Timeless style that can be dressed up or dressed down. With its classic timepiece aesthetic, the vívomove Style doesn’t look like your average smartwatch. But, below its analogue hands lies a sophisticated touchscreen and all the tech you’d expect from Garmin. Equipped with the latest generation Elevate optical heart rate monitor, pulse information comes straight off your wrist.  Heart rate information is used for tracking calories, stress level, fitness age, and more. Internal accelerometers take cues from your movements, from waking the display as you raise your arm, to tracking your waking and resting. Paired with a smartphone running Garmin Connect, you can get smart notifications, weather data, review your calendar and control phone apps like music players. Connect used the power of your phone’s GPS to tell you more about how you train. Share with Garmin’s online community, join challenges, mark milestones, and get encouragement. Keep an eye on your stress levels by monitoring your heart rate variability. Seeing spikes helps you find ways to remove stress triggers. When stress levels are high, a relaxation timer helps you bring more calm to your day.Light and strong anodised aluminum case and tough domed Corning® Gorilla® crystal.Textured nylon or sleek silicone straps travel well and can be dressed up, or down.Classic analogue hands automatically move out of the way when using the touchscreen.Discreet colour touchscreen AMOLED display is only visible when needed, reverting to stylish analogue timepiece when not in use.Move IQ intelligently detects an tracks activity, your Garmin Connect timeline ensures you get credit for all of your daily exercise.Preloaded with strength training, elliptical training, stair stepping, yoga, and cardio training activity profiles.Equipped with Garmin’s V3 Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor. Elevate V3 has a red LED to provide Pulse Ox measurements.Broadcast of your HR over ANT+ (so other devices can pick it up).VO2 max data gives you a peak behind the curtain, helping you better understand your fitness level by looking at how efficiently your body uses oxygen.Body Battery™ tracks your daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food, etc.), you get a better idea of how and when to train.Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment; by linking credit cards to your Garmin account, you can make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank).Stress level score monitors heart rate variability while inactive to produce a stress score from 0-100, the lower the score, the lower your stress.  When stress levels are high, the vívomove’s relaxation timer takes you through steps to lower your levels.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking mode monitors your rest, breathing patterns, total sleep hours as well as periods of movement and restful sleep in your Garmin Connect profile.Counts flights of stairs with internal barometer data that’s combined with your step data.Weekly intensity minutes are displayed against the ideal of 150 needed to maintain a healthy life.Move bar reminds you to move after being stationary for too long.Connected GPS features leverage your phone’s GPS to track your training, offering speed, distance and pace for running and cycling.Automatically syncs your data to your phone running the free Garmin Connect app.Free Garmin Connect app lets you review activities, receive texts, social media alerts, emails, etc., download training plans, track the weather and more, all via Bluetooth to your phone.Internal memory stores up to 7 timed activities and 2 weeks worth of daily activity. Garmin Connect will store all of your activity data.Rechargeable lithium-ion battery lasts up to 5 days as an activity tracking smartwatch, or 2 weeks in watch only mode.20mm lug width and quick-release straps, makes strap customization easy.Fits wrist sizes 125-190mm.In the box: vívomove Style, charging cable, documentation.
